name: Roy Tang
text: I think the pro-Duterte stuff more naturally leans towards memes since his appear is primarily emotional in nature, i.e. fear and anger, so they're easier to summarize in a sentence or two and the people they appeal to need less words to be affected. The anti-side on the other hand relies more on reasoning out, so it's more difficult to express as memes
